#This set is still used for a lot of event ships etc
component_set = {
	key = "combat_computers"

	required_component_set = yes
	icon = "GFX_ship_part_computer"
	icon_frame = 1
}
component_set = {
	key = "corvette_combat_computers"

	required_component_set = yes
	icon = "GFX_ship_part_computer"
	icon_frame = 1
}
component_set = {
	key = "destroyer_combat_computers"

	required_component_set = yes
	icon = "GFX_ship_part_computer"
	icon_frame = 1
}
